activities: ZeroChaos is a manager of contract labor services on behalf of our clients.  In this capacity ZeroChaos will be collecting personal information for contractors and at times sub vendors working on client projects in order to manage the client project, assure compliance with legal and client policy, and issue payment.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: on-line, manually processed data, human resources data
recoursemech: After registering inqueries or complaints through our service and compliance departments the independent organization that will handle disputes will be the European Union Data Protection Authorities.
